sn40.9:1.4: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
sn40.9:1.6: So khvaham, avuso, sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharami.
sn40.9:1.7: Tassa mayham, avuso, imina viharena viharato nimittanusari vinnanam hoti.
sn40.9:2.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava iddhiya upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn40.9:2.3: Ma, brahmana, animittam cetosamadhim pamado, animitte cetosamadhismim cittam santhapehi, animitte cetosamadhismim cittam ekodim karohi, animitte cetosamadhismim cittam samadaha’ti.
sn40.9:2.4: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja vihasim.
sn40.9:2.5: Yanhi tam, avuso, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn40.9:2.6: ‘sattharanuggahito savako mahabhinnatam patto’ti, mamam tam samma vadamano vadeyya:
